name: Techno Dash (itch)
description:
Techno Dash Needs Pilots

The universe is running out of stars to power our civilization and the Galactic Federation needs pilots for the Techno Dash initiative! This requires diving into another dimension where you are tasked with collecting the materials to make new stars. If you've got fast reflexes and the will to survive, apply now! Fast collectors are greatly rewarded with better equipment and ships. No previous experience required. We will even train you how to fly!

Techno Dash is Hammerwing Studios' first game. It is a 3d endless runner but with the controls of Star Fox added.

Features

  • Fast paced gameplay with procedurally generated space!
  • Jam packed with items to upgrade and ships to use!
  • Full controller support!
  • Original Techno themed songs!

Try it out!

You can try it now before buying by either playing our mobile versions or the demo below!
